;;;38       /*
;;;39        * Reset lock count
;;;40        */
;;;41       GUI_ALLOC_Lock();     /* Memory lock */
000006  f7fffffe          BL       GUI_ALLOC_Lock
;;;42       for (i = LockCnt; i; i--) {
00000a  4625              MOV      r5,r4
00000c  b125              CBZ      r5,|L1.24|
                  |L1.14|
;;;43         GUI_Unlock();       /* Dec task lock */
00000e  f7fffffe          BL       GUI_Unlock
000012  1e6d              SUBS     r5,r5,#1              ;42
000014  2d00              CMP      r5,#0                 ;42
000016  d1fa              BNE      |L1.14|

;;;44       }
;;;45     #endif
;;;46       GUI_X_WAIT_EVENT();
000018  f7fffffe          BL       GUI_X_ExecIdle
;;;47     #if GUI_OS
;;;48       /*
;;;49        * Restore lock count
;;;50        */
;;;51       for (i = LockCnt; i; i--) {
00001c  b124              CBZ      r4,|L1.40|
                  |L1.30|
;;;52         GUI_Lock();         /* Inc task lock */
00001e  f7fffffe          BL       GUI_Lock
000022  1e64              SUBS     r4,r4,#1              ;51
000024  2c00              CMP      r4,#0                 ;51
000026  d1fa              BNE      |L1.30|

;;;53       }
;;;54       GUI_ALLOC_Unlock()  ; /* Memory unlock */

;;;56     }
